body: Instead of logging an error, this seems like it should return an error status, because the parser is unlikely to have the correct behavior. I'd suggest moving the schema-to-types/shapes conversion out before the `IgniteDataset` is constructed (typically in a `DatasetOpKernel`) so that you can use `OP_REQUIRES_OK()` to report the error.
